title: No hidden room in King Tut's tomb: researchers
text:
No hidden room in King Tut's tomb: researchers 2:36pm BST - 01:22
After years of debate, Italian researchers say there's no secret chambers beyond Tutankhamun's tomb, which archaeologists had hoped was Queen Nefertiti's final rest place. Michelle Hennessy reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
After years of debate, Italian researchers say there's no secret chambers beyond Tutankhamun's tomb, which archaeologists had hoped was Queen Nefertiti's final rest place. Michelle Hennessy reports.
